subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Jets released the veteran tight end Chris Baker on Friday. Baker, who signed a three-year contract extension in September, had 145 career receptions for 1,505 yards and 12 touchdowns since being drafted by the Jets in the third round in 2002.
snippet: The Jets released the veteran tight end Chris Baker on Friday. Baker, who signed a three-year contract extension in September, had 145 career receptions for 1,505 yards and 12 touchdowns since being drafted by the Jets in the third round in 2002.
